channel.title: Like bricks in the sky - pelican

item.title: Instantbird Blog: WordPress to Pelican
item.description: The Instantbird blog is now (as of mid-April 2020) hosted on GitHub Pages (instead of self-hosted WordPress) [1]. Hopefully it was converted faithfully, but feel free to let us know if you see something broken! You can file an issue at the repo for the blog or just comment below …
item.dc:creator: Patrick Cloke
